resources.string: This app includes three tests and these tests are about latest technologies and programming languanges. With this app, may some people can desire to learn one of the these topics. Enjoy when you solving the tests ! Do not forget, all tests have 50 questions !
Latest Technology test1: 1-10 questions -> Virtual Reality, 11-20 questions -> Augmented Reality, 21-30 -> Networking, 31-40 -> 5g Network, 41-50 -> Microsoft Azure
Latest Technology test2: 1-10 questions -> Data Science, 11-20 questions -> Machine Learning, 21-30 -> Artificial Intelligence, 31-40 -> Deep Learning, 41-50 -> Block Chain"
Programming Languange: 1-10 questions -> Swift, 11-20 questions -> Android, 21-30 -> Dot Net, 31-40 -> C Sharp, 41-50 -> Ado Dot Net
We will add more questions as soon. Wait the new questions!
